hymn.title: Praise the Lord, we're in the Lord's recovery

layout.singingstanza: Praise the Lord, we're in the Lord's re -- cov -- ery— Home at last, here in the church. Praise the Lord, we're in the new cre -- a -- tion— One new man, the end of our search. (the end of our search) With the saints, build -- ed, co -- or -- di -- nat -- ed; No more I, for -- ev -- er "we." We are one in the Son, stand -- ing here till He comes; Yes, noth -- ing can stop our God till He's done!
